column4: Can someone tell me how to install gnome-ppp on ubuntu 6.10 (I get an error message could not find package)??
i see it in my listing.
see if synaptic will find "ppp" with a search for it.
do you have the universe repository enabled?
ah, i see.  not on the cd.
right, but what protocol did you tell it to use, chat?
stupid question, but did you try another number?
open a terminal program, hold on.....
can you post your /etc/chatscripts/provider and /etc/ppp/peers/provider to #flood?
the other, of course, is the actual uname and password
hope it works.  i hate ppp
